title: Honey, rosemary and lemon roast lamb
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2.25kg (5 lb) whole leg of lamb', '1 teaspoon coarse sea salt']
